item.title: AI4CS - AI for complex systems: Brain, Earth, Climate, Society
item.description: Keywords: Artificial intelligence, Machine learning, causal inference, graphical models, environment, climate change, remote sensing, Earth science, Climate science, Social sciences. Our vision in AI4CS is to develop novel artificial intelligence methods to model and understand com- plex systems, and more specifically the visual brain, Earth and climate systems and the biosphere- anthroposphere interactions. A perfect storm is over us: (i) an ever increasing amount of observational and sensory data, (ii) improved high resolution yet mechanistic models are available, and (iii) advanced ma- chine learning techniques able to extract patterns and identify drivers from data.
